text.0: advancing sending forth her rays the daughter of the sky is seen.
text.1: uncovering that we may see the mighty gloom the friendly lady makes the light.
text.2: the sun ascending the refulgent star pours down his beams together with the dawn.
text.3: o dawn at thine arising and the suns may we attain the share allotted us.
text.4: promptly we woke to welcome thee o uṣas daughter of the sky.
text.5: thee bounteous one who bringest all we long to have and to the offerer health and wealth.
text.6: thou dawning workest fain to light the great world yea heaven goddess that it may be seen.
text.7: we yearn to be thine own dealer of wealth may we be to this mother like her sons.
text.8: bring us that wondrous bounty dawn that shall be famed most far away.
text.9: what child of heaven thou hast of nourishment for man bestow thou on us to enjoy.
text.10: give to our princes opulence and immortal fame and strength in herds of kine to us.
text.11: may she who prompts the wealthy lady of sweet strains may uṣas dawn our foes away.
